original: “nārthatadvatvaṃ tasya viṣayaḥ“iti maṇyukterubhayathā saṃbhavāt svātantryeṇeti kaiścidvyākhyānācca dvedhā vikalpaḥ --saṃbandhiteti //

sva ava a dvāraḥ

original: dharmadharmyaṃśayoriva tadvaiśiṣṭyāṃśepi vyavasāyapratyāsatteḥ satvena tadapratītau hetvabhāvācca /

sajatam jānāmi iti anuvyavasāye pi rajata rajata tvayoḥ

atas eva guṇa tva prameya tva ādi sāmānya pratyāsatti janye sa saṃbandhīka saṃyoga ādi sākṣātkāre

na ca evam api saṃyoga tva sāmānya pratyasatti janye saṃyoga sākṣātkāre vyabhicāraḥ
evam hi laukika iti api sākṣātkāraḥ viśeṣaṇīyaḥ dharma iti

original: bāhyārthatvepi rajatasthaṃ rajatatvaṃ tadādhārabhūtaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca yathānuvyavasāyasya viṣayaḥ tathā rajate rajatatvavaiśiṣṭyamapi viṣayostu,

original: nanu dharmadharmyaṃśayoḥ saṃśayo na kadācit tadvatvāṃśe tu sostīti saṃśaya eva tadapātītau hetu 1 kalpaka iti cenna /

vyavasāya gatasya rajata tva vaiśiṣṭya viṣayaka tvasya asiddhi āpātāt ca
na hi anuvyavasāyāt anyena tad siddhiḥ
na ca vaiśiṣṭyam agṛhṇan ananuvyavasāyaḥ tad viṣayaka tva gra haṇe śaktaḥ
nanu vaiśiṣṭya viṣayaka vyavahāra ādi liṅgaka anumityā vyavasāya prāmāṇya anumityā vā tad siddhiḥ

original: idaṃ rajatvena jānāmītihi tadākāro natvidaṃ rajatamiti /

original: nanu tadaṃśe 'nuvyavasāyāntarataḥ siddhiranubhavasiddhetyato nirāha -- na ceti //
analyzed: nanu tad aṃśe nuvyavasāya antarataḥ siddhiḥ anubhava siddhā iti atas nirāha na ca iti

original: itare tu anyatra viparyaye dharmijñānasya hetutvepi vartamānavyavasāyadharmike 'vyavasāyarūpe 'pramāyāṃ pramātvaviparyaye
analyzed: itare tu anyatra viparyaye dharmi jñānasya hetu tve pi vartamāna vyavasāya dharmike vyavasāya rūpe pramāyām pramā tva viparyaye

original: na ca pragāropyasya prāmāṇyasyānupasthiter na tadaropa iti vācyam /

analyzed: svatastva pakṣe pramāyām prāmāṇya pratimiteḥ iva bhrame prāmāṇya apopasya api tad anapekṣa tvāt iti āhuḥ

original: śuktyādāveva rajatatvādyāropo nānyatretyetanniyāmakatayā rūpyādiniṣṭhacākacakyādimattayā śuktyādijñānasya tadāropahetutvamāvaśyakamiti bhāvaḥ  #

vartamāna ityādi
yathā hi ghaṭa ādi pramāyām tad anuvyavasāyena vyavasāya upanīta tadvat tva ādi ghaṭika prāmāṇya grahaḥ

original: tathā śuktirūpyādyapramāyāmapi tadanuvyavasayena tadupanītatadvatvādighaṭitaprāmāṇyaṃ dharmijñānaṃ vinaiva taduttarakṣaṇa eva paricchidyata  #
analyzed: tathā śukti rūpya ādi apramāyām api tad anuvyavasayena tad upanīta tadvat tva ādi ghaṭita prāmāṇyam dharmi jñānam vinā eva tad uttara kṣaṇe eva paricchidyata

original: prāmāṇyānupasthiteḥ kathaṃ tadāropa ityāśaṅkya nirāha -- na cetyādinā //
analyzed: prāmāṇya anupasthiteḥ katham tad āropaḥ iti āśaṅkya nirāha na ca ityādinā

original: ata eva pūrvapakṣe maṇikṛtāpyuktam“apramāpi prametyeva gṛhyate“ityādīti bhāvaḥ /

original: nanu tacchaṅkābhāvaḥ prāmāṇyaniścayarūpapratibandhādiva svahetvabhāvādapi saṃbhavatīti bhāvena“prāmāṇyaniścayānavaśyaṃbhāvāt“iti maṇyādyuktaśaṅkate

tat ca anitya pramā mātra anugata guṇa abhāve pi ananugata guṇaiḥ api setstyati
tatra ca pramāṇam anitya pramā tvam sva āśraya mātra vṛtti dharma avacchinna kāryatā āśraya mātra vṛtti
apramā tva vat iti anumānam
yajñapatim āśaṅkate atha api iti
atha api ityādi uktam eva vyanakti
pramā iti uktā iti
apramā kāraṇa tā ityādinā uktā iti arthaḥ tasya iti
anitya pramā tvasya iti arthaḥ sva iti
svasya anitya pramā tvam sva āśrayaḥ tanmātra vṛttayaḥ tad itara avṛtti tve sati tad vṛttayaḥ
ye dharmāḥ janya pratyakṣa pramā tva ādayaḥ tad avacchinna kāryatā āśrayaḥ eva vartamāna tva mukta kāryatā āśraya
eva vartamāna tvam ukta kāryatā āśraya
tu avyāpya tvam iti yāvat
tat uktam eva pañca mātra anumānam āha anitya pramātvam iti
bādha nirāsāyāḥ nityā iti
sādhyam ukta artham
sādhya hetvoḥ sva padam samabhivyāhṛta param

original: evaṃ cānityapramātvāśraya eva yo na vartate dharmaḥ anityajñānatvādiḥ tadavacchinnakāryatānirūpitakāraṇāśrayo
analyzed: evam ca anitya pramātva āśraye eva yaḥ na vartate dharmaḥ anitya jñāna tva ādiḥ tad avacchinna kāryatā nirūpita kāraṇa āśrayaḥ
manaḥ saṃyoga ādiḥ tanmātrān utpādya kāryam anitya pramā tanmātra vṛtti dharma tvāt iti hetvarthaḥ
anitya jñāna kāraṇa mātra anutpādya kārya mātra vṛtti dharma tvāt iti phalitaḥ ūrthaḥ

ya pakta vanu naṅgaḥ
prāmāṇya vādaḥ

viśeṣa kāraṇa janya tvam sarva pramā anugata guṇasya bādhi tvena ananugata guṇa janya tvam ādāya paryavasyati

original: atra ca sādhye ādyaṃ mātrapadaṃ svatastvapakṣepyanityapramātvasya svādhikadeśavṛttinānityajñānatve 2 nāvacchinnakāryatāśraya eva vartamānatvātsiddhasādhanamiti  #

original: sādhye mātrapadadvayaṃ vyavacchedārthakaṃ na tu kātsnārthakamityupetya duṣaṇajñānasaukaryāya vyāvartyaṃ vyanakti -- atra ceti //

aparokṣa padam tu upādāna jñānasya aparokṣa tvena eva hetu tvāt dyāpaka āta siddhi artham
sākṣātkāra padam tu na upāttam
prābhākaram prati sākṣā tva jāteḥ asiddheḥ
aparokṣa padena tu parokṣa anya jñānasya vivakṣita tvāt adoṣaḥ
kālī śarīra utpanna gaura rūpasya iti arthaḥ sandigdha iti
pracīna matena idam dūṣaṇam bodhyam
doṣāya iti agre vyakta tvāt yāvat iti
yāvantaḥ bhimatāḥ viśeṣaṇa guṇāḥ tadvatva siddhi artham iti arthaḥ vyāpaka tā iti
gagana paramāṇu ādi jñānasya śabda ādikam pratyupādana tve pi cīkārṣa ākṛti dvārā śabda ādi ahetu tvāt bhāva kārya tva ādi rūpa hetu vyāpaka tva siddhi artham aparokṣa pada upādānam iti arthaḥ
pakṣadhara uktam āha sākṣātkāra iti
asiddheḥ iti
guṇa gata jāteḥ anaṅgīkārāt
indriya janya jñānana paratvam tu na śaṅkā arham
bādhā āpātāt iti bhāvaḥ bhāṣya iti
ṇasi kakha tkāra tva jā cha dhyeyaṃa
īsi anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
upādāna gocara padam tu bhāṣyakāra ādi ukta dhvaṃsa vyāvṛtta sa kar tṛka tva siddhi artham
tāvati ukte siddha sādhanam
aṅkura ādeḥ api sva janaka adṛṣṭa janaka yat kiñcid upādāna bhūta haviḥ ādi gocara jñāna ādimat asmat ādi janya tvāt
tad artham adṛṣṭa ityādi bhinna antam jñāna ādi viśeṣaṇam
evam ca na siddha sādhanam

original: kācaraṇaprāgabhāvasya kāryaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvenāsmadādiniṣṭhādṛṣṭajanakajñānādiprāgabhāvasya svajanyādṛṣṭaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvena  #
analyzed: ka ācaraṇa prāgabhāvasya kārya prāgabhāvam prati vyāpya tvena asmat ādi niṣṭha adṛṣṭa janaka jñāna ādi prāgabhāvasya sva janya adṛṣṭa prāgabhāvam prati vyāpya tvena

original: na caivaṃ kapālā 2 dirūpopādānagocaramadṛṣṭaprāgabhāvavyāpyaprāgabhāvapratiyogibhinnaṃ ca yajjñānādi tadvatāsmadādinārthāntaram /
analyzed: na ca evam kapāla ā di rūpa upādāna gocaram adṛṣṭa prāgabhāva vyāpya prāgabhāva pratiyogi bhinnam ca yat jñāna ādi tadvatā asmat ādinā artha antaram

original: jñānecchākṛtīnāṃ svaviṣayasamavetakāryaṃ pratyeva janakatvena kapālādi gocarajñānādeḥ kṣityādyajanakatvena bādhāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: jñāna icchā ākṛtīnām sva viṣaya samaveta kāryam prati eva janaka tvena kapāla ādi gocara jñāna ādeḥ kṣiti ādi ajanaka tvena bādhāt  /

original: sarvasyāpi jīvopabhogyatayā tattadadṛṣṭārjitatvena yadaṅkurādikaṃ yajjīvādṛṣṭajanyaṃ tadadṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: sarvasya api jīva upabhogya tayā tad tad adṛṣṭa arjita tvena yat aṅkura ādikam yat jīva adṛṣṭa janyam tat adṛṣṭam
tāvat yajña ādi sat kārma janyam
tādṛśa adṛṣṭa janakam svagata rūpa ādi upādāna bhūta hiviḥ ādi gocaram yat jñāna ādi tadvat asmat ādi jīvanyatvāt iti arthaḥ tad artham iti
siddhasādhanatā nivṛti artham iti arthaḥ vyāpya tvena iti

original: yadā jñānādiprāgabhāvastadā tajjanyādṛṣṭaprāgabhāva iti saṃbhavāditi bhāvaḥ -- vakroktiriti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: yadā jñāna ādi prāgabhāvaḥ tadā tad janya adṛṣṭa prāgabhāvaḥ iti saṃbhavāt iti bhāvaḥ vakroktiḥ iti
ādi padam na asti ca
atra yadi api adṛṣṭa janaka bhinnā iti ukte ipi asmat ādibhiḥ na siddhasādhanam
tathā api īśvara jñāna ādeḥ api adṛṣṭa janaka tvāt bādhaḥ
sa mā abhūt iti vakra uktiḥ
evam ca na bādhaḥ
īśvara jñāna ādeḥ anādi tvena prāgabhāva pratiyogi tvasya ai vā abhāvena tad pratiyogi bhinna tvāt
tāvati ukte dṛṣṭāntasya sādhya vaikalyam

original: kulālaniṣṭhasya ghaṭajanakajñānādiprāgabhāvasya tanniṣṭhavihitādikriyāntaro 2 tpatsyamānādṛṣṭaprāgabhāvaṃ prati vyāpyatvāt /
analyzed: kulāla niṣṭhasya ghaṭa janaka jñāna ādi prāgabhāvasya tad niṣṭha vihita ādi kriyā antara utpatsyamāna adṛṣṭa prāgabhāvam prati vyāpya tvāt
tad artham sva janya tvena adṛṣṭam viśeṣitam
evam ca sādhya vaikalyam
utpatsyamāna adṛṣṭasya ghaṭa upādāna ādi viṣayaka jñāna ādi janya tva abhāvāt
adṛṣṭa janaka bhinnā iti arthaḥ eva adṛṣṭa prāgabhāva pratiyogi bhinnā iti uktiḥ iti arthaḥ jñāna ādi iti
kulāli niṣṭhā iti arthaḥ
vihita ādi iti
niṣiddhā karaṇam ādi padārthaḥ kriyā antarā iti
kapāla ādi kriyātaḥ nyakriyā iti arthaḥ
sva janya tva na adṛṣṭam viśeṣitam iti

original: yadyapi pakṣadharādāvadṛṣṭapadaṃ svajanakādṛṣcaṭaparaṃ svapadaṃ ca samabhivyāhṛtapakṣadṛṣṭāntarūpakāryaparamityuktaṃ tathāpi tasminpadārthaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi api pakṣadhara ādau adṛṣṭa padam sva janaka adṛṣcaṭa param sva padam ca samabhivyāhṛta pakṣa dṛṣṭānta rūpa kārya param iti uktam tathā api tasmin padārthaḥ
kvacid dṛṣṭānte iti ananugamaḥ

original: na cātra grandhakṛdabhimatasāmānyavyāptāvananugamo na doṣāyeti rucidattoktaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: na ca atra grandhakṛt abhimata sāmānya vyāptau ananugamaḥ na doṣāya iti rucidatta uktam yuktam
yat tadbhyām sāmānya vyāptiḥ na anumāna bhaṅgam iti arthāpattau granthakṛtā eva nirāsāt
evakāraḥ na asti
īsi anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
dvitīya sādhye smat ādibhiḥ siddhasādhana vāraṇāya sva janaka adṛṣṭa uttara iti

atra ca bhāṣya ādau sakartṛkatva niruktau upādāna pada prakṣepāt dhvaṃsa vyāvṛtta sakartṛkatva siddhi artham pakṣa sādhya hetuṣu samaveta upādā bhāva padāni
prayuktāni
tathā kulāla kṛteḥ ghaṭa janaka adṛṣṭa samāna jātīya agāmya dṛṣṭa prāgabhāva vyāpya prāgabhāva pratiyoga gi tvena ukta doṣa tādavasthyāt

original: tadarthaṃ ṭhakkuroktadiśā janakatvaṃ phalopadhānarūpaṃ vivikṣiṇīyamiti kleśa ityuttarasādhyāsāṅkaryāya ca svajanyetyeva vivikṣaṇīyamiti bhāvaḥ  #
analyzed: tad artham ṭhakkura ukta diśā janaka tvam phala upadhāna rūpam vivikṣiṇīyam iti kleśaḥ iti uttara sādhya asāṅkaryāya ca sva janyā iti eva vivikṣaṇīyam iti bhāvaḥ
siddha sādhana iti
tatra sva padasya samabhivyāhṛta pakṣa dṛṣṭānta paratvāt asmat ādi jīva kṛteḥ kṣiti ādi janakatve pi adṛṣṭa dvārā eva

original: na sākṣāditi kṣityādijanakādṛṣṭapūrvabhāvitayā taduttarabhāvitvābhāvānna siddhasādhanamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na sākṣāt iti kṣiti ādi janaka adṛṣṭa pūrva bhāvi tayā tad uttara bhāvi tva abhāvāt na siddhasādhanam iti bhāvaḥ
ṭhakkura ādau tu kālī rūpa ādau aṃśataḥ
siddha nādhana vāraṇāya sva janaka adṛṣṭa uttara iti viseṣaṇam iti uktam tṛtīye ca iti
siddha sādhana vāraṇāya iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
iti viśeṣaṇam iti
tasya jñāna ādi viṣaya upādāna samavetāni iti artha tvena kṣiti ādoḥ asmat ādi jñāna ādi viṣaya samaveta tva abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ
prāk ukta prayoge dhvaṃsasya sa kartṛka tva anāpatyā sakala jagāt nirmātṛ kartṛ siddhiḥ na syāt iti atas
yat vā ityādinā maṇau uktam pakṣa antaram tat pūrva ukta pakṣa tātparya viviraṇa pūrvam anuvadati
atra ca ityādinā
mātreṇa iti
upādāna ādi ghaṭita tvena vinā iti mātra padārthaḥ pakṣa ādau iti
prayukta padam na asti ga

original: yadā tu dhvaṃsasādhāramasakartṛkatvamātreṇeśvara 1 siddhestanmtraṃ siṣādhayiṣitaṃ tadā pakṣādau samavetādipadānyanaparekṣitānyeva /
analyzed: yadā tu siddheḥ tanmtram siṣādhayiṣitam tadā pakṣa ādau samaveta ādi padāni anaparekṣitāni eva

original: 2 asmiṃśca pakṣe asmadādiniṣṭhaghaṭādijanakakṛtidhvaṃsasya 3 niruktarupakṛtijanyatvena tadbhinnatvābhāvāttasya pakṣatā na syāt /
analyzed: asmin ca pakṣe asmat ādi niṣṭha ghaṭa ādi janaka kṛti dhvaṃsasya nirukta rupa kṛti janya tvena tad bhinna tva abhāvāt tasya pakṣatā na syāt
tad artham kṛti pada sthāne tritaya iti vācyam

original: evaṃ ca kṛtidhvaṃsasya pratiyogibhūtayā kṛtyāvirodhiguṇabhūtenottarajñānena ca janyatvepi cikīrṣājanyatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: evam ca kṛti dhvaṃsasya pratiyogi bhūtayā kṛtyā virodhi guṇa bhūtena uttara jñānena ca janya tve api cikīrṣā janya tva abhāvāt
cikārṣā dhvaṃsasya ca ukta rītyā cikīrṣā ākṛti janya tve api jñāna janya tva abhāvāt tayoḥ api pakṣatā siddhaḥ
pakṣa sādhya hetuṣu samaveta apādāna bhāva padāni anapekṣitāni iti arthaḥ
nanu adṛṣṭa advāra janya kṛti janya bhinnāni janyāni iti eva pakṣa nirdeśe sati ghaṭha janaka kṛti dhvaṃsasya

original: pakṣatā na syādityato janyecchākṛtityajanyatvaṃ vivakṣaṇīyamityuktvā kṛtidhvaṃsādeḥ
analyzed: pakṣatā na syāt iti atas janya icchā kṛti tya janya tvam vivakṣaṇīyam iti uktvā kṛti dhvaṃsa ādeḥ
pakṣa tvam upapāditam
tat āha asmin ca iti
sa viṣayaka iti
adṛṣṭa advāraka sa viṣayaka tritaya janya bhinnāni janyāni iti vācyam iti arthaḥ virodhi iti
uttarātma viśeṣa guṇa bhūtayā uttara kṛtyā janya tvāt iti atas āha cikīrṣā iti
jñāna iti

original: tasya cikīrṣātaḥ pūrvabhāvitayā tajjanakatvena taddhvaṃsājanakatvāditi bhāvaḥ -- tayorapīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: tasya cikīrṣātaḥ pūrva bhāvi tayā tad janaka tvena tad dhvaṃsa ajanaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ tayoḥ api iti
raḥ siddhaḥ cha anyathā iti adhikam vartate cha ayaṃgranthaḥ na asti cha
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
yat vā kṣitiḥ eva pakṣaḥ
nanu evam pakṣāt anyatra aṅkure saṃdigdha anaikāntyam

original: na ca niścitasādhyābhāvavati sādhanasaṃdeha eva doṣo na tu sandigdhasādhyesādhanāniścayopīti vācyam /
analyzed: na ca niścita sādhya abhāvavati sādhana saṃdehaḥ eva doṣaḥ na tu sandigdha sādhye sādhana aniścayaḥ api iti vācyam
hetau sādhya abhāvavat gāmi tva saṃdehasya duṣaka tā bījasya ubhayatra api satvāt na ca evam
vidhasya saṃdehasya pakṣe pi satvāt anumāna mātra ucchedaḥ
tad artham eva pakṣāt anyatra iti viśeṣita tvāt iti ced na
pakṣāt iti atra pakṣa śabdena prayoga viṣaya vivakṣāyām svārtha anumāna ucchedāt
kṛti cirṣā dhvaṃsayoḥ api iti arthaḥ
nanu evam api na sarva dhvaṃsasya pakṣa tā

original: anyathā tasya bhogatatsādhanetaratayā adṛṣṭājanyatvena svajanakādṛṣṭāprasiddhyoktarūpasādhyāsaṃbhavena tadaṃśe bādhāpatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā tasya bhoga tad sādhana itaratayā adṛṣṭa ajanya tvena sva janaka adṛṣṭa aprasiddhyā ukta rūpa sādhya asaṃbhavena tad aṃśe bādha āpatteḥ

original: uktadiśā anyonyābhāvasya pakṣātavacchedakatayā tasya tanmate 'prasiddhyā āśrayāsiddheśceti
analyzed: ukta diśā anyonya abhāvasya tasya tad mate prasiddhyā āśraya asiddheḥ ca iti

original: pakṣadharoktarucyā maṇau“kṣitireva vā pakṣa“ityadinā pakṣāntaramuktvopapāditaṃ tadāha --yadveti //

pakṣaḥ iti
pratijñā viṣayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kṣitereva pakṣatve maṇyuktabādhakaśaṅkā taduttaraṃ ca niṣkṛṣyāhi -- nanvityādineṣṭasiddherityantena //

anumāna mātra uccheda bhayāt pakṣāt anyā iti uktam

pakṣa lakṣaṇa vat vivakṣāyām ca aṅkurasya api pakṣa tvāt
atas eva tatra pakṣa sama vyavahāraḥ
aṅkurasya anupādānam tu kṣiti mātra upādāne ipi iṣṭa siddheḥ

original: nanvevaṃ saṃdigdhopādhyāhitaḥ pakṣa eva vyabhicārasaṃdehopi na doṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nanu evam saṃdigdha upādhyā āhitaḥ pakṣaḥ eva vyabhicāra saṃdehaḥ api na doṣaḥ syāt

original: atra tu kāryatvarūpahetūcchittereva bādhakatvātta 4 nniścaya iti vaiṣamyamita vācyam /
analyzed: atra tu kāryatva rūpa hetu ucchitteḥ eva bādhaka tvāt tad niścayaḥ iti vācyam

original: pakṣ vyabhicārasaṃ 5 dehe 6 sya dūṣakatve tarkasyāpi pakṣe vyabhicārasaṃdehena praśithilamūlatvāpātāditi cenna // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

iṣṭa siddheḥ iti

original: tāvataiveśvarasiddheriti vā ghaṭādau niścitavyāptikasya liṅgasya pakṣapakṣasamayordarśanenobhayatrāpyanumityatpatteriti 7 vārthaḥ /

original: saṃdigdhasādhyavati hetatuniścayona doṣa ityatra bādhakaṃ vakṣyamāṇasamādhimāha -- nanvityādinā adoṣatvādityantena //
analyzed: saṃdigdha sādhyavati doṣaḥ iti atra bādhakam vakṣyamāṇa samādhim āha nanu ityādinā adoṣa tvāt iti antena
saṃdigdhā iti
sa śyāmaḥ mitrā tanaya tvāt iti aṣṭama garbha stha viṣaya prayoge śāka pāka ja tva upādheḥ pakṣāt vyāvṛtti saṃdehena āhita sādhya saṃdeha mūlaḥ vyabhicāra saṃśayaḥ api iti arthaḥ
tatra tasya adoṣa tve vyāpti niścayaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ
tatra vyāpti aniścayaḥ nyanimittakaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha na ca iti

original: sādhyābhāve heturna syādityevaṃ rūpatarkasyāpi āpādyāpādakayorvyāptisaṃdehenetyarthaḥ -- vipratipatyādīti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: sādhya abhāve hetuḥ na syāt iti evam rūpa tarkasya api āpādya āpādakayoḥ vyāpti saṃdehena iti arthaḥ vipratipati ādi iti

īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ

original: nanvidamaprayojakaṃ nityāyāḥsarvaviṣayāyāśceśvarakṛteridānīṃ saṃdigdhatvena kṛtisāmānyasya deśataḥ kālato 3 vā

vyatireka aniścayena kārya sāmānyam prati kāraṇa tva agrahāt

original: ghaṭakulālakṛtirūpaviśeṣayoreva vyatirekasya kāraṇatvasya vā grahaṇenābādhe sāmānyayorapi hetutvasiddheḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: ghaṭa kulāla kṛti rūpa viśeṣayoḥ eva vyatirekasya kāraṇa tvasya vā grahaṇena ābādhe sāmānyayoḥ api hetu tva siddheḥ
sādhāraṇa dharma ādiḥ ādi padārthaḥ atathātvena iti
anumiti ananukūla tvena iti arthaḥ

original: “atha kṛtikāryayornānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ vyāptigrahaḥ“ityādinā maṇyuktameva dūṣyāṃśaṃ śaṅkāpūrvamanuvadati -- nanvidamityādinā //
analyzed: atha kṛti kāryayoḥ na anvaya vyatirekābhyām vyāpti grahaḥ ityādinā maṇi uktam eva dūṣya aṃśam śaṅkā pūrvam anuvadati nanu idam ityādinā
bhāva kārya tva ādi rūpa anumānam iti arthaḥ idānīm iti
anumānāt prāk iti arthaḥ
īśvara kṛti vyatirekasya nyāya mate pi abhāvena
eva ākṣepa samādhi uktaḥ iti jñeyam
anvaya ākṣepasya api upalakṣaṇam vā

ghaṭa iti ghaṭa rūpa kulāla kṛti rū viśeṣayoḥ iti arthaḥ kāraṇa tvasya iti

na tasya tasya iti na asti kum vā iti na asti
katham anyathā ākāśa ādeḥ samavāyi kāraṇasya nitya tvāt vibhu tvāt ca samavāyi kāraṇa sāmānya vyatireka aniścayāt śabda ādi samavāyi kāraṇa tvena ākāśa ādi siddhiḥ

original: nanvavamapi dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyavikalaḥ kulālādikṛterevānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāraṇatvagrahaṇe 1 mānābhāvena kulālasyāhetutvāditi cenna //

original: prayatnavadātmasaṃyogasya 2 ceṣṭādvārā ghaṭahetutayā tadviśeṣeṇatayā prayatnasyevātmano 'pi hetutvāt // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: prayatna vat ātma saṃyogasya ceṣṭā dvārā ghaṭa hetu tayā tad viśeṣeṇa tayā prayatnasya iva ātmanaḥ api hetu tvāt

original: pramāṇavākyatvena vaktṛvākyārthapramātvena kāryatvādikalpane 'pi vākyasāmānyavaktṛjñānasāmānyayostada 3 bādhādabādhana ityuktam -- ākāśādisiddhiriti
analyzed: pramāṇa vākya tvena vaktṛ vākya artha pramā tvena kārya tva ādi kalpane vākya sāmānya vaktṛ jñāna sāmānyayoḥ bādhāt abādhanaḥ iti uktam ākāśa ādi siddhiḥ iti
tatra ghaṭa kapāla ādi rūpa viśeṣaṇayoḥ eva vyatireka ādi grahaṇena iti ukta rīteḥ eva anusartavya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ ahetu tvāt iti
tathāca katimat janya tva rūpa sādhyam tatra na iti arthaḥ
māna abhāvena iti asiddham

original: kulālo ghaṭahetuḥ taddhetusaṃyogāvacchedakatvāt kapālavat ghaṭahetvātmasaṃyogavadekaprayatnavadveti mānābhāvāditi bhāvenāha //
analyzed: kulālaḥ ghaṭa hetuḥ tad hetu saṃyoga avacchedaka tvāt kapāla vat ghaṭa hetu ātma saṃyoga vat eka prayatna vat vā iti māna abhāvāt iti bhāvena āha
prayatna iti
prayatnasya eva eti upalakṣaṇam
asamavāyi kāraṇa saṃyoga āśraya kapāla ādeḥ iva iti api dhyeyam

original: nanvātmasaṃyoge sati prayatnaṃ vinā na ceṣṭeti prayatna eva heturna tu prayatnavadātmasaṃyoga ityata āha -- saṃyogasyeti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: nanu ātma saṃyoge sati prayatnam vinā na ceṣṭā iti prayatnaḥ eva hetuḥ na tu prayatna vat ātma saṃyogaḥ iti atas āha saṃyogasya iti
bhāvā ku
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
saṃyogasya hetu tve mānam tu
ceṣṭā prayatnavat ātma saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇikā sva vyadhikaraṇa tadīya guṇa vyatireka prayakta vyakireka pratiyogi tvāt
yat sva vyadhikaraṇa tad iya guṇa vyatireka prayukta vyatireka pratiyogi tad tad iya saṃyoga samavāyi karaṇakam  /
prayatna vat ātma saṃyogasya ghaṭa hetu abhaṅga ceṣṭā hetu tve mānam tu anumānam iti agretanena anvayaḥ ceṣṭā iti
śarīra spandaḥ iti arthaḥ prayatna iti

original: prayatnavata ātmanaḥ śarīrasya ca yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tadasamavāyikāraṇiketyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prayatnavataḥ ātmanaḥ śarīrasya ca yaḥ saṃyogaḥ tad asamavāyi kāraṇikā iti arthaḥ
abhighātaka saṃyogena artha anatara nirāsāya prayatna vat ityādi viśeṣaṇam
hetau sva iti parismandaḥ

original: svavyadhikaraṇaḥ svādhikaraṇabhinnādhikaraṇakaḥ tadīyaḥ ātmīyo guṇaḥ prayatnaḥ tavdyatirekaprayuktavyatirekapratiyogitvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sva vyadhikaraṇaḥ sva adhikaraṇa bhinna adhikaraṇakaḥ tadīyaḥ ātmīyaḥ guṇaḥ prayatnaḥ
kalāla rūpa janya ghaṭa rūpe vyabhicāra nirāsāya tat iya iti uktiḥ
ātmīya iti arthaḥ
yat vā ukta pratiyogi kriyā tvāt iti hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
atas na vyabhicāraḥ
hetoḥ eva abhāvāt
evam ca tat iya iti tad śabdasya
samabhivyāhṛta paratve api na doṣaḥ
sva vyadhikaraṇa pada kṛtyam agre vyaktam

original: yadyapi maṇau“yā kriyā vyadhikaraṇayadiyaguṇajanyā“ityādivyāptyuktyā guṇajanyatvāditi heturvācyā vyāptiśca tathaiva pradarśanīyā /
analyzed: yadi api kriyā guṇa janyā ityādi vyāpti uktyā guṇa janya tvāt iti hetuḥ vācyā vyāptiḥ ca tathā eva pradarśanīyā

original: tathāpi kriyāyā īśvara 2 guṇajanyatvepi neśvarasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇakatvamiti vyabhicarānirāsāya taṭṭīkārthānuvādo guṇavyatirekaprayuktetyādiḥ
analyzed: tathā api kriyāyāḥ īśvara guṇa janya tve pi na īśvara saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇaka tvam iti vyabhicara anirāsāya tad ṭīkā artha anuvādaḥ guṇa vyatireka prayukta ityādiḥ
yat iti yat parismapanda ākhyam karma iti arthaḥ
maṇau api yā kriyā iti eva uktiḥ
ka iti anumānam guru tve ityādi vartate guṇa padam na asti
yathā sparśavat vegavat pavana abhighāta kāraṇikā parṇa ādi kriyā pavana saṃyoga asamavāyi karaṇikā iti anumānam
guru tva vyatireka prayukta vyatireka pratiyogini guru tva samāna adhikaraṇe patane
guru tva vat dravya saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇaka tva rahite vyabhicāra nirāsāya hetau sva vyadhikaraṇa iti uktam
anyathā ceṣṭā eva na utpadyeta
asamavāyi kāraṇa abhāvāt
kāraṇa pratyāsati abhāvena prayatnasya hetu tva anupapatteḥ ca

original: na caivamapyātmā hetubhūsaṃyogāvacchedaka eva na heturiti vācyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: na ca evam api ātmā hetu bhū saṃyoga avacchedakaḥ eva na hetuḥ iti vācyam
anyathā kapāla rupa janya ghaṭa rūpe vyabhicāra āpatteḥ yathā iti
yathā parṇa ādi kriyā iti anvayaḥ

āmna phala ādi patane iti arthaḥ
sva vyadhikaraṇa yadīya vyatireka prayukta vyatireka pratiyogi iti etāvati ukte āmnā ādi vṛkṣa patana kriyāyām vyabhicāraḥ

original: tasyāṃ svavyadhikaraṇo ya āmnādivṛkṣaḥ svārambhakāvayavasambandhitvādavayavī yaśca
analyzed: tasyām sva vyadhikaraṇaḥ yaḥ āmnā ādi vṛkṣaḥ sva ārambhaka avayava sambandhi tvāt avayavī yaḥ ca
tad vyatireka prayukta vyatire pratiyogi tve api āmnā avayava saṃyoga asamavāyi kāraṇaka tva abhāvāt
atas yadīya guṇa iti uktam
vipakṣa bādhaka rūpam hetoḥ anukūla tarkam āha anyathā iti

samavāyi iti adhikam vartate

original: nanu ghaṭādau jñānasya kṛtidvāraiva hetutvatkṛtiṃ ca pratīṣṭasādhanatvānumitereva hetutvātsākṣātkārasyāhetu 1 tvena sādhyalaikalyamiti cenna
analyzed: nanu ghaṭa ādau jñānasya kṛti dvārā eva hetu tvat kṛtim ca prati iṣṭa sādhanatva anumiteḥ eva hetu tvāt sākṣātkārasya ahetu tvena sādhya laikalyam iti ced na
kṛtiḥ hi siddha

original: tatra sādhyāṃśe ghaṭādāviṣṭhasādhanatvānumitisatvepi siddhāṃśasya kapālādeḥ sākṣātkāravyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekadarśanenopādānasākṣātkārasyāpi  #
analyzed: tatra sādhya aṃśe ghaṭa ādau iṣṭha sādhanatva anumiti sattve api siddhāṃśasya kapāla ādeḥ sākṣātkāra vyatirekeṇa kṛti vyatireka darśanena upādāna sākṣātkārasya api
hetu tvāt

original: na ca manaḥkriyāhetumanoviṣayakakṛtau vyabhicāraḥ samānādhikaraṇasya siddhamanoviṣayaka sākṣātkārāderabhāvāditi vācyam /
analyzed: na ca manaḥ kriyā hetu manaḥ viṣayaka kṛtau vyabhicāraḥ samāna adhikaraṇasya siddha manaḥ viṣayaka sākṣātkāra ādeḥ abhāvāt iti vācyam
tvac indriya gṛhīta manaḥ vahana nāḍī gocara kṛtyāḥ nāḍyām kriyā utpattau
atha ghaṭa kṛti sādhya iṣṭasādhana tā jñānam cikīrṣā dvārā hetuḥ

original: tacca na pratyakṣam“ityādinā maṇyuktāveva prakārantareṇa sādhyavaikalyatatsamādhī niṣkṛṣyānuvadati -- nanvityādinā //
analyzed: tat ca na pratyakṣam ityādinā maṇi uktau eva prakāra antareṇa sādhya vaikalya tad samādhī niṣkṛṣya anuvadati nanu ityādinā
sādhyā iti
upādāna gocara aparokṣa jñāna cikīrṣā ākṛtimat janya tva ādi rūpa sādhyā iti arthaḥ vyabhicāraḥ iti

original: yanniṣṭhā yā kṛtiḥ sā tadgocarāparokṣapūrviketyasya vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: yad niṣṭhā yā kṛtiḥ sā tad gocara aparokṣa pūrvikā iti asya vyabhicāraḥ iti arthaḥ
tam eva vyanakti samāna adhikaraṇasya iti
sākṣātkāra ādeḥ iti ādi padena
cikīrṣā grahaḥ
manasaḥ tīndriya tvāt iti bhāvaḥ manaḥ vahana iti
tvāt muca naḥ iti na asti chakha kṛtya siddha chakha
yadi api upādāna mātram siddham
tathā pi upādeyava tvena sādhya tvāt tatra cikīrṣā yuktā

original: na ca ghaṭe siddhaviṣayakasākṣātkārajanayatvavadasiddhaviṣayakaparokṣajñānajanyatvasyāpi darśanādīśvarasya nityapratyakṣavannityānumitiḥ syāditi  #
analyzed: na ca ghaṭe siddha viṣayaka sākṣātkāra janaya tva vat asiddha viṣayaka parokṣa jñāna janya tvasya api darśanāt īśvarasya nitya pratyakṣa vat nitya anumitiḥ syāt iti
vācyam

original: siddhaparamāṇvādiviṣayakaparokṣajñāne satyapyaparokṣatvavyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekasyeva sādhyāṃśajñāne satyapi parokṣatvavyatirekeṇa kṛtivyatirekasyādarśanāt
analyzed: siddha paramāṇu ādi viṣayaka parokṣa jñāne sati api aparokṣa tva vyatirekeṇa kṛti vyatirekasya iva sādhya aṃśa jñāne sati api parokṣa tva vyatirekeṇa kṛti vyatirekasya adarśanāt
manasaḥ ādhāra bhūtā iti arthaḥ manasi kriyā ātpatteḥ iti
tathā ca yatra kṛti nāḍyām tatra asti aparokṣa ādi pūrvakatvam

original: yatra manasi nāstyaparokṣajñānaṃ tatra na kṛtiriti na vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: yatra manasi na asti aparokṣa jñānam tatra na kṛtiḥ iti na vyabhicāraḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvevamapi siddhe karaṇecchābhāvenopādāne cikīrṣāyogātpunaḥ sādhyavaikalyamityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirāha -- yadyapīti //
analyzed: nanu evam api siddhe karaṇa icchā bhāvena upādāne cikīrṣā yogāt punar sādhya vaikalyam iti āśaṅkām anūdya nirāha yadi api iti
evam aprayojaka tva sādhya vaikalye nirasya nanu evam ghaṭa ādau anumiti janya tva darśanāt īśvare
anumitiḥ api syāt ityādinā maṇi ukta tarka parāhati śaṅā uttare anuvadati na ca ityādinā

original: īśvare janyajñānābhāvālliṅgajanyajñānaṃ kathaṃ syāditi āha -- pratyakṣasyendriyajanyatvepi nityapratyakṣavadanumiterliṅgajanyatvepi nityānumitiḥ  #
analyzed: īśvare janya jñāna abhāvāt liṅga janya jñānam katham syāt iti āha pratyakṣasya indriya janya tve api nitya pratyakṣa vat anumiteḥ liṅga janya tve api nitya anumitiḥ
syāt iti arthaḥ
anumite ra nitya tve ādi kālīna div vaṇuka ādi ajananāt tad avinābhūta śarīra indriya abhāva āpātāt ca iti bhāvaḥ aparokṣa tve pi
tasmin jñāne iti arthaḥ kṛtī iti
ḍi āsa muca kha teḥ nitya kum abhāva padam na asti mu
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ

original: na ca tatrāpi bhagavataścikīrṣā hetutvena kalpyā /

original: evaṃ hi dveṣayonikṛtisādhyadṛṣṭāntena kṣityādeparapi dveṣavajjanyatvāpātena nityadveṣāpatteriti cenna /
analyzed: evam hi dveṣa yoni kṛti sādhya dṛṣṭāntena dveṣa vat janya tva āpātena nitya dveṣa āpatteḥ iti ced na
tatra api dve
ghaṭa paṭa ādi rūpa sādhya aṃśasya iṣṭasādhanatvena anumiti rūpa parokṣa jñāne sati tad viṣayaka kapāla ādi niṣṭha kṛteḥ darśana vat
sādhya aṃśasya iṣṭasādhanatvena aparokṣa jñāne sati sādhya viṣayiṇyāḥ tad hetu niṣṭhāyāḥ kṛteḥ

original: vyatirekasya kvāpyadarśanena sādhyāṃśa 3 syeṣṭasādhanatve jñānatvameva vaddhetuniṣṭhakṛtau
analyzed: vyatirekasya kvāpi adarśanena sādhya aṃśaḥ sya iṣṭasādhanatve jñāna tvam eva vat hetu niṣṭha kṛtau

original: prayojakam lāghavāt na tu tatra sādhyāṃśasyeṣṭasādhanatva 4 jñāna parokṣatvamapi /
analyzed: prayojakam lāghavāt na tu tatra sādhya aṃśasya iṣṭasādhanatva jñāna parokṣatvam api
gauravāt

original: evaṃ ceśvarasyāpi kṣityādirūpasādhyāṃśasya 5 svaṣṭāsādhanatājñānamaparokṣarūpamastīti taddhetūpādanaparamāṇvādikṛtiryukteti na nityānumityāpattidoṣa  #
analyzed: evam ca īśvarasya api kṣiti ādi rūpa sādhya aṃśasya svaṣṭa asādhanatā jñānam aparokṣa rūpam asti iti tad hetu upādana paramāṇu ādi kṛtiḥ yuktā iti na nitya anumiti āpatti doṣa
iti bhāvaḥ
evam kṛteḥ aparokṣa jñāna pūrvaka tve vyabhicāram uddhṛtya tad prasaṅga āgatam ati prasaṅgam

original: ca nirasyedānīṃ kṛteścikīrṣāpūrvakatve vyabhicāracodyotta 6 re maṇyukte 7 evāha -- nanu dveṣeti //
analyzed: ca nirasya idānīm kṛteḥ cikīrṣā pūrvaka tve vyabhicāra codya utta re maṇi ukte eva āha nanu dveṣa iti
dveṣa kāraṇaka duḥkha nivṛti anu kūla kṛti sādhye duḥkha abhāva ādau iti arthaḥ
tatra īśvarīya ācikīrṣā kalpanena vyabhicāra abhāve pi aniṣṭa prasaṅgaḥ tu syāt iti āha evam hi iti
tatra dveṣa yoni tvam eva kṛteḥ na asti
yena tad dṛṣṭāntena kṣiti ādau api dveṣavat janyatvam syāt iti āha tatra api iti
dveṣa yoni itinā asti kha sābhāka sya tvam jñāne mu
raṃ kum ktame kum rūpa kum cikīrṣā janya iti adhikam kum

original: - ta 1 tsādhanatvena jñāne cikīrṣāya eva 2 saṃbhavena bhinnaviṣayakadveṣasyāhetutvāt //

analyzed: na ca ivam pravṛtti yatna atiriktasya
kriyā vyatireka anuguṇasya dveṣa prayojyasya nivṛtti yatnasya abhāvāt dveṣe māna abhāvaḥ
dveṣmi iti abādhita anubhāvāt

original: duḥkhābhāvasādhanepi tatsādhanatvena dveṣyābhāvasādhanatvena jñāne sati sādhanagocaracikīrṣāyā eva saṃbhavenetyarthaḥ -- bhinneti //
analyzed: duḥkha abhāva sādhane api tad sādhana tvena dveṣya abhāva sādhana tvena jñāne sati sādhana gocara cikīrṣāyāḥ eva saṃbhavena iti arthaḥ bhinna iti
śatru vaṣaka dveṣasya tad vadha sādhana gocara kṛteḥ ca bhinna viṣaya tvena dveṣya abhāva sādhana kṛtau śatru viṣayaka dveṣasya ahetutvāt iti arthaḥ

original: yadi dveṣo na kṛtihetustarhi dveṣo 'līka eva bhavedityāśaṅkya pratyakṣeṇāsiddhimāha --na caivamiti //
analyzed: yadi dveṣaḥ na kṛti hetuḥ tarhi dveṣaḥ līkaḥ eva bhavet iti āśaṅkya pratyakṣeṇa asiddhim āha na ca evam iti

original: evaṃ dveṣasya pravṛttirūpasādhanagocarakṛtā 3 vahetutve dveṣaviṣaye mānābhāva ityanvayaḥ /
analyzed: evam dveṣasya pravṛtti rūpa sādhana gocara kṛtā va hetu tve dveṣa viṣaye māna abhāvaḥ iti anvayaḥ

original: duḥkhasādhanādau nivṛttirūprayatnaṃ prati bhinnaviṣayasyāpi dveṣasyaiva hetutvāt dveṣe nivṛttirupakāryameva mānamityata uktam -- pravṛttīti
analyzed: duḥkha sādhana ādau prati bhinna viṣayasya api dveṣasya eva hetu tvāt dveṣe nivṛttiḥ upakāryam eva mānam iti atas uktam pravṛtti iti
pravṛtti rūpa prayatna iti arthaḥ kriyā iti
abhāvāt iti
duḥkha ādi kārya abhāva ānukūlyasya duḥkha gocara dveṣa janya nivṛtti rūpa yatnasya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
pravṛtti rūpaḥ nivṛtti rūpaḥ ca iti yatna dvaividhyam yadi syāt tadā pravṛtti prayatnaḥ cikārṣā dvāra iṣṭa sādhana tā jñānāya asādhyaḥ

original: nivṛttiyatnastu dveṣasādhya iti dveṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ syāt /
analyzed: nivṛtti yatnaḥ tu dveṣa sādhyaḥ iti dveṣaḥ prāmāṇikaḥ syāt
na ca evam
pravṛtti rūpa prayatna abhāvasya eva nivṛtti tvāt

original: na ca nivṛttirūprayatnābhāva eva pravṛttiriti vaiparītyaṃ śaṅkyam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: na ca nivṛtti rūpa yatna abhāvaḥ eva pravṛttiḥ iti vaiparītyam śaṅkyam
trasāka tatra iti api vartate
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu

original: nanu tathāpi ghaṭādau ceṣṭāvyāpārakakṛtereva hetutvavadhāraṇāt kṣityādau ca ceṣṭāyā yogyā 1 nupalabdhibādhitatvā 2 tkṛterahetutvam /
analyzed: nanu tathā api ghaṭa ādau ceṣṭā vyāpāraka kṛteḥ eva hetu tva avadhāraṇāt kṣiti ādau ca ceṣṭāyāḥ yogyā anupalabdhi bādhita tvāt kṛteḥ ahetu tvam
na ca etasmin
suṣupti daśāyām nivṛtti viraha satvena pravṛtti sādhya ceṣṭā ādi kārya ādi āpatteḥ

original: na ca tadā nivṛttiviraha eva neti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca tadā nivṛtti virahaḥ eva nā iti yuktam
tadā duḥkha sādhanatva jñāna viraheṇa tad nimitta dveṣasya nivṛtti hetoḥ abhāvena nivṛtteḥ abhāvāt

original: na caivaṃ pravṛttiyatno rāgānnittastu dvaiṣāditi kusuñjalyuktivirodhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca evam pravṛtti yatnaḥ rāgāt nittaḥ tu dvaiṣāt iti kusuñjalī ukti virodhaḥ
tad mate tathātve pi maṇikṛt mate tad abhāvāt
anyathā akutas tarhi dveṣaḥ
śatrūn maṇi ukti virodhāt

original: etena yattu kusumāñjalivākyānurodhena kuta ityādimaṇivākyasya pakṣadharīyaṃ kleśanārthavarṇanaṃ tattu maṇukṛdabhiprāyājñānamūlamiti vibhāvitaṃ  #
analyzed: etena yat tu kusumāñjali vākya anurodhena kutas ityādi maṇi vākyasya kleśana artha varṇanam tat tu maṇukṛt abhiprāya ajñāna mūlam iti vibhāvitam
dhyeyam
evam kṛteḥ aparokṣa jñāna cikārṣā pūrvaka tvam vyabhicāra nirāsena ghaṭa ādau

original: kṛtisādhyatā hastādivyāpārādvāraiva na tu sākṣāt ityādinā maṇyuktabādhaśaṅkātatsamādhī
analyzed: kṛti sādhya tā hasta ādi vyāpāra a dvārā eva na tu sākṣāt ityādinā maṇi ukta bādha śaṅkā tad samādhī
āha nanu tathā api ityādinā
aprayojaka tva sādhya vaikalya vyabhicāra nitya anumiti nitya dveṣa āpatti rūpa tarka parāhatya doṣāṇām abhāve pi iti arthaḥ ceṣṭā iti
aṅga ceṣṭā iti arthaḥ ahetutvam iti
tathāca kṛtimat janyam bādhitam iti bhāvaḥ

original: na ceṣṭākṛtyordvāribhāvāpannatayā ghaṭādau hetunā kintu pratyekameva /
analyzed: na ca iṣṭā kṛtyoḥ dvāri bhāva āpanna tayā ghaṭa ādau hetunā kintu pratyekam eva

original: pitāputrayoḥ paurvāparye 3 pyekatra ghaṭe dvayoḥ svātantreṇa hetutvapadupapatteḥ /
analyzed: pitāputrayoḥ paurvāparye pi ekatra ghaṭe dvayoḥ svātantreṇa hetu tva pad upapatteḥ

original: tathā ca yathoktasādhye na bādha iti bhāvenāśaṅkya nirāha -- na ceti // @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: tathā ca yathā ukta sādhye na bādhaḥ iti bhāvena āśaṅkya nirāha na ca iti
gya upaca tvena kṛmuca ṇa eka mu

original: na caikasmin ghaṭe pitāputrayoriva ceṣṭākṛtyoḥ svātantryeṇa hetunā /
analyzed: na ca ekasmin ghaṭe pitāputrayoḥ iva ceṣṭā kṛtyoḥ svātantryeṇa hetunā
ghaṭa anukūla ceṣṭā āśraya sannihitasya tad anukūla kṛtimataḥ
nigaḍa niścala deha tvena ceṣṭā rahitasya api puṃsaḥ tad hetu tva āpatteḥ api ced mā evam
ceṣṭā vyāpāraka kṛti tvena kāraṇatā na tāvat kārya mātre kṣiti ādau
vyabhicāreṇa tvayā api tathā na abhyupagamāt
na api kṛti janya tva avacchinne
ātma āśrayeṇa kṛti janya tvasya sva anavacchedaka tvāt

original: ghaṭādau kāryaviśeṣe tathā kāraṇatve ca sāmānyaviśeṣanyāyena kāryasāmānye kṛtitvenaiva hetutvāt //
analyzed: ghaṭa ādau kārya viśeṣe tathā kāraṇa tve ca sāmānya viśeṣa nyāyena kārya sāmānye kṛti tvena eva hetu tvāt
atas eva ceṣṭā janya tva śarīra janya tva ādi rūpa upādhiḥ api na
vyabhicārāt na pratyekam hetuḥ iti āha ghaṭa iti

original: kiṃ kāryamātre kṛtijanyakāryamātre vā ghaṭādikāryaviśeṣe veti hṛdi vikalpyādyadvayaṃ nirasyānte tviṣṭasiddhyā na bādha ityāha -- ceṣṭetyādinā
analyzed: kim kārya mātre kṛti janya kārya mātre vā ghaṭa ādi kārya viśeṣe vā iti hṛdi vikalpya ādya dvayam nirasya ante tu iṣṭa siddhyā na bādhaḥ iti āha ceṣṭā ityādinā
tvayā api iti
nirīśvara ādinā api
na kevalam aśarīra īśvara vādinā mayā iti arthaḥ avacchinnaḥ iti
kārya mātre iti anukarṣaḥ sāmānya iti

original: yadviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇābhāvaḥ bādhakābhāve tatsamānyorapīti nyāyena ghāṭādirūpakāryaviśeṣatvena
analyzed: yad viśeṣayoḥ kārya kāraṇa abhāvaḥ bādhaka abhāve tad samānyoḥ api iti nyāyena ghāṭa ādi rūpa kārya viśeṣa tvena
ceṣṭā dvāraka kṛti tvena kārya kāraṇa bhāve vyabhicāra rūpa bādhaka abhāvena kārya tvena kṛti tvena
kārya karaṇa bhāva kalpana pakṣe api kevala kṛteḥ eva hetu tvāt iti arthaḥ atas eva iti
kṛti tvena kṛti janya tvasya nyāya prāpta tvāt eva iti arthaḥ
ced na mu ca rūpa padam na cha kha
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
gauraveṇa ceṣṭā tva ādinā rūpeṇa kāraṇa tvena upādheḥ aprayojaka tvam

original: na 1 nvathāpi jñānamanityameva kartā śarīryevetyādivyāptibādha iti cenna /
analyzed: na nu atha api jñānam anityam eva kartā śarīrī eva ityādi vyāpti bādhaḥ iti ced na
jñāna tva ādeḥ nitya tva ādinā kārya kāraṇa bhāva ādeḥ abhāvena vyāpteḥ eva abhāvāt
kārya kṛtyoḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt
anyathā avayavaḥ mahān e vā ityādi vyāptyā param aṇuḥ api na sidhyet
atas eva adṛṣṭa advāraka anitya jñāna ajanya tva ādinā satpratipakṣatvam api nirastam
anitya jñāna ādimat janya tva ādiḥ ādi pāda arthaḥ na iti
na bhavati iti arthaḥ ceṣṭā tva ādinā iti

original: syādetat kartā śarīryeva jñānamanityamevetyādiprāthamikavyāptigrahapratyakṣavirodhāt ityādinoktaśaṅkottare niṣkṛṣyānuvadati -- nanvityādinā
analyzed: syāt etat kartā śarīrī eva jñānam anityam eva ityādi prāthamika vyāpti graha pratyakṣa virodhāt ityādinā ukta śaṅkā uttare niṣkṛṣya anuvadati nanu ityādinā
anyathā iti
vyāpti prayojaka kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya sādhyena vinā hetoḥ anavasthita tva ādeḥ anukūla tarkasya abhāve pi vyāpti abhyupagamaḥ iti arthaḥ
vdyaṇukam sva nyūna parimāṇa dravya apabdham kārya tvāt ghaṭa vat ityādi anumānena paramāṇu siddhiḥ na syāt
yaḥ bhāvaḥ sa mahān yathā tri aṇuka ādiḥ
avayavaḥ ca ayam paramāṇuḥ iti anena bādhāt iti syāt iti arthaḥ

original: nanvathāpi kṣityādikaṃ noktasādhyavat adṛṣṭadvārakānityajñānājanyatvāt 4 ghaṭavadita satpratipakṣatvam /
analyzed: nanu atha api kṣiti ādikam na ukta sādhyavat adṛṣṭa dvāraka anitya jñāna ajanya tvāt sat pratipakṣa tvam
asiddhi nirāsāya hetvoḥ adṛṣṭa dvārakā ityādi uktiḥ iti atas āha atas eva iti
tat eva vyanakti
nu tathā muca nanu api  kakha evakāraḥ na asti chakha dvayakum śarīra janya tvāt
aprayojaka tvāt
hetu tva sambhavena
atas eva śaśaśṛṅga pratibandī api nirastā
tatra anukūla tarka abhāvāt tu lāghavāt

original: nanvanumitervyāpakāṃśe vyāpakatāpacchedakamātraprakārakatvādihāpi vyāpakaḥ kartā vyāpakatāvacchedakakartṛtvena na si 2 dhyete /
analyzed: nanu anumiteḥ vyāpaka aṃśe vyāpakatā apacchedaka mātra prakāraka tvāt iha api vyāpakaḥ kartā vyāpaka tā avacchedaka kartṛ tvena na si
ekatvena katham setsyati iti ced mā evam
anumiti sāmāgrī mahamnā tathātve pi lāghava tarka sahakāri rūpa pramāṇa sāmagrī mahimnā ākyasya
tat ca kṣiti ādi upādāna gocaram jñāna ādikam lāghavāt ekam nityam ca iti viṣa saṃkocaka abhāvāt kapāla ghaṭa ādi gata rūpa
aprayojaka tvāt iti

original: nanvevamayogyasya sādhane śaśo viṣāṇavān paśutvādgovaditi śaśaśruṅgasiddhirapi syāditi āha -- ata eveti //
analyzed: nanu evam ayogyasya sādhane śaśaḥ viṣāṇavān paśu tvāt go vat iti śaśa śruṅga siddhiḥ api syāt iti āha atas eva iti
aprayojaka tvāt eva iti arthaḥ
tat eva vyanakti anukūlā iti

original: nanvevaṃ kartṛmātrasiddhāvapi tadekatvaṃ kutaḥ siddhamityata āha -- katraikyaṃ tviti //
analyzed: nanu evam kartṛ mātra siddhau api tad ekatvam kutas siddham iti atas āha katra aikyam tu iti
tat eva śaṅkā uttarābhyām vyanakti nanu ityādinā

original: astu katraikaḥ tadgatajñānāderekatvādisiddhiḥ kathamityata āha -- tacceti //
analyzed: astu tadgata jñāna ādeḥ eka tva ādi siddhiḥ katham iti atas āha tat ca iti
jñāna ādikam iti anvayaḥ
eva iti na asti kum ga raga kha kum
īsyā anuka tva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
kartṛ tvena rūpa ādi upādāna bhūta kapāla ādi gocaratva avaśyaṃbhāvāt ca sarva viṣayakam eva iti

original: atrocyate / anupalabdha prākkodiṣu bhūbhūdharādiṣu kāryatvameva kutaḥ /
analyzed: atra ucyate bhūbhūdhara ādiṣu kāryatvam eva kutas
sāvayava tvāt iti ced
sāvayavatvam sāṃśatvam ced gagana ādau vyabhicāri
evam ūditam anumānam dūṣayitum pratijānīte atra ucyate iti
hetu virodhaḥ dvividhaḥ asiddhiḥ avyāptiḥ ca iti bhagavat pāda uktyā hetu doṣayoḥ asi ddhi vyāpti abhāvayoḥ madhye
siddheḥ eva prāthamyāt paraiḥ api asiddha viruddha ityādi prācām nirdeśena asiddheḥ prāthamya upagamāt ca

original: samavetatve 4 satītyādinābhimatakāryatvahetorasiddhiṃ tāvat“kiñcānupalabdhaprakkoṭiṣu kāryatvaṃ kutaḥsiddham“ityādinā tatvanirṇayaṭīkoktāṃ  #
analyzed: samaveta tve sati ityādinā abhimata kāryatva hetoḥ asiddhim tāvat kiñca anupalabdha prakkoṭiṣu kāryatvam kutas siddham ityādinā tatvanirṇayaṭīkā uktām
prapañcayati anupalabdhā iti
prakka udiḥ prāgabhāvaḥ
nanu kṣiti ādikam kāryam sāvayavatvāt ghaṭa vat iti anumānāt tad siddhiḥ

original: na ca sāvayavatvenaivoktarūpakṛtimajjanyatvaṃ sādhyatāṃ kiṃ madhye kāryatvasādhaneneti
analyzed: na ca sāvayavatvena eva ukta rūpa kṛtimat janyatvam sādhyatām kim madhye kāryatva sādhanena iti

original: vācyam / pūrvoktarītyā kṛti 5 janyatve kāryatvasyeva sāvayavatvasyānukūlatarkābhāvāt
analyzed: vācyam pūrvokta rītyā kṛti janya tve kāryatvasya iva sāvayavatvasya anukūla tarka abhāvāt
kāryatva rūpa sādhyena hetu ucchiti ādi rūpa anukūla tarka abhāvat iti bhāvena āśaṅkyate sāvayavatvāt iti ced iti
tarhi evam ākāśa ādīnām api kāryatva prasaṅgāt iti ādi śāstrayoni sūtra sudhā uktim hṛdi kṛtvā āha gagana ādau vyabhicāri iti
tat eva vyanakti gagana iti
eva kāraḥ na asti majjanyakum

original: gaga 1 nādeḥ paramāṇośca saṃyogatvena sāṃśatva 2 siddheḥ /
analyzed: gaga nādeḥ paramāṇoḥ ca saṃyoga tvena sa aṃśa tva siddheḥ
vistṛtam ca etat anyatra
dravya ārabdha dravya tvam ced akārya tva vādinam prati asiddham
gagana ādiḥ sa aṃśaḥ saṃyogi tvāt ghaṭa vat
na ca aprayojakaḥ hetuḥ

original: tasyeha pakṣī neha pakṣītyabādhitapratītyā gaganādau vyāpyavṛttitvāyogena svātyantābhāvasāmānādhikaraṇaṣūpāvyāpyavṛttitvasya
analyzed: tasya iha pakṣī na iha pakṣī iti abādhita pratītyā gagana ādau vyāpya vṛtti tva ayogena sva atyanta abhāva sāmānādhikaraṇa   avyāpya vṛtti tvasya
ca ekatra virodhena eka deśa rūpa aṃśa vṛtti tvasya eva gagana ādau
sarvatra vyāpya vṛtti tva ayogena eka deśa rūpa aṃśa vṛtti tvasya eva vācya tvāt
tasya api aupādhika tve navasthā ādi āpātena svābhāvika aṃśa vyatirekeṇa saṃyogi tvasya eva anupapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ

original: nanvevaṃ gaganakālaparamāṇvāderapi saṃyogitvena sāṃśatve tulyanyāyatayā 3 śasyāpi saṃyogitvena sāṃśatvaṃ tadaṃśasyāpyovamiti paramāṇvaṃśasyāpyānantyaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu evam gagana kāla paramāṇu ādeḥ api saṃyogi tvena sāṃśatve tulya nyāyatayā śasya api saṃyogi tvena sāṃśatvam tad aṃśasya api ovam iti paramāṇu aṃśasya api ānantyam
syāt
tathā ca gagana paramāṇvoḥ tulya parimāṇa tā āpattiḥ
kiñca paramāṇu tva vyāghātaḥ

original: api copādānādirūpāvayavādiriktāṃśasatve mānābhāvāt tadrūpāṃśavatvasya gaganādāvapyabhyupagame 'nityatvāpetteścetyata āha /
analyzed: api ca upādāna ādi rūpa avayava ādi rikta aṃśa satve māna abhāvāt tad rūpa aṃśavatvasya gagana ādau api abhyupagame nitya tva apetteḥ ca iti atas āha
vistṛtam ca etat anyatra iti
atas sarva padārthānām bhāgāḥ santi eva sarvadā
sarva dikṣu abhisaṃbandhāt avibhāgaḥ para aṇu tā
ityādi anuvyākhyā sudhāyoḥ vaiśeṣika adha karaṇe
na kāla ādeḥ kaca chakha tvena chakha sa aṃśa kum
ī syā an u kva bhaṅgaḥ
īśvara vādaḥ pu
dravya samaveta dravya tvam ced jāti ādeḥ iva akārya tvena api upapatyā aprayojaka tā

original: madhyamaparimāṇatvaṃ cettadāpyaprayojakataiva -- gaganapradeśasyeva sāṃśatvenai 3 va tadupapatteḥ /
analyzed: madhyama parimāṇa tvam ced tadā api aprayojaka tā eva gagana pradeśasya iva tad upapatteḥ
avayava nairapekṣyeṇa eva madhyamī bhūta parimāṇa āśraya tva mātreṇa dravyasya madhyama parimāṇa tva upapatteḥ ca

original: sarṣapo yāvantaṃ deśamavaṣṭabhya vartamāno dṛśyate tāvatyevānadhikatadavayavaparaṃparā gaganepyevamityaṅgīkāre tulyapiramāṇatāpatteḥ /
analyzed: sarṣapaḥ yāvantam deśam avaṣṭabhya vartamānaḥ dṛśyate tāvatī eva anadhika tad avayava paraṃparā gagane api evam iti aṅgīkāre tulya piramāṇa tā āpatteḥ

original: yataḥ svāvayavaṃ vinā svatantramanavayavarūpamapakṛṣṭaparimāṇaṃ nāsti sa paramāṇurityuktervyāghātābhāvādityā 5 dyukteriti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yatas sva avayavam vinā svatantram anavayava rūpam apakṛṣṭa parimāṇam na asti sa paramāṇuḥ iti ukteḥ vyāghāta abhāvāt ityā di ukteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tathā upādāna atirikta aṃśa sattva ādikam ca upādhi khaṇḍa ṭīkā bhāvaprakāśikāyām vistṛtam iti arthaḥ
jāti ādeḥ iva iti
adravyasya jāteḥ eka tva saṅkhyā parimāṇa ādeḥ dravya samaveta tva api akārya tve yathā dravya sameta dravyasya api akārya tvam astu
vipakṣe bādhaka abhāvāt iti bhāvaḥ gagana pradeśasya iva iti

original: yathā iha pakṣītyādipratītyā pakṣyādyādhārapradeśasya madhyamapiramāṇatvepi tasya
analyzed: yathā iha pakṣī ityādi pratītyā pakṣi ādi ādhāra pradeśasya tasya
pradeśasya api ukta diśā aneka aṃśa yuta tvam tathā kṣiti ādeḥ avayava ārabdha tva rūpa kārya tva abhāve pi
ca tad ubhaya parimāṇa anya pirimāṇa rūpa madhyama parimāṇa tvasya upapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
parimāṇasya avayava upacaya hetuka tvam upetya uktam
vaḥ tatas tat eva mā astu iti āha avayava iti
yathā paramāṇu ādau avayava nairapekṣyeṇa eva aṇu pirimāṇam mahat parimāṇam ca tathā madhyama piramāṇam astu
dravya tvam ced iti nā asti rūpya samavetaḥ iti api vartate ka
dravya samaveta khagaḥ eva iti na asti chakum ādi padam na asti mu pūrva uttara padam na mu

original: bhūmyāderupalabhyamānā bhāgāstu nāramyakarūpā avayavāḥ kintu gaganasya pradeśabhedā iva kālasya kṣaṇādaya iva cāṃśā eva santu //
analyzed: bhūmi ādeḥ upalabhyamānāḥ bhāgāḥ tu na āramyaka rūpāḥ avayavāḥ kintu gaganasya pradeśa bhedāḥ iva kālasya kṣaṇa ādayaḥ iva ca aṃśāḥ eva santu

original: ata eva bhūmeḥ khananādinā pūrvāvayavanināśenāvayavyantarotpatteḥ kāryatvaṃ siddhamiti nirastam /
analyzed: atas eva bhūmeḥ khanana ādinā pūrva avayava nināśena avayavi antara utpatteḥ kārya tvam siddham iti nirastam
kṣaṇa ādi nāśena kālasya api tad prasaṅgāt
pradīpa guṇe prabhāyām darśanāt

original: na ca prabhā na guṇopitu dravyamiti yuktam /
analyzed: na ca prabhā na guṇaḥ upitu dravyam iti yuktam
guṇāt vā āloka vat iti sūtra bhāṣya ṭīkā candrikāsu

original: svoktadoṣaṃ mūlārūḍhaṃ darśayituṃ na cānumānāttatsiddhiriti pūrvavākyasya kṣityādyupādānagocarajñānāditvena

original: uktarūpajñānavajjanyaṃ cikīrṣāvajjanyamityatrāpyevaṃ doṣo dhyeya iti bhāvena kṛtimātrasya prāgvvayahārepi jñānāderityuktam /

original: yaccoktaṃ viśeṣayorananvayavyatirekeṇa vā kāraṇatvena vā sāmānyorapi kāraṇatvamiti /

viśeṣayoḥ anvaya ādi dṛṣṭyā sāmānyayoḥ api tad kalpanāt iti atas āha yat ca uktam iti

ghaṭa kulāla kṛtyoḥ anvaya ādinā kārya sāmānya kṛti sāmānyayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ iti yad tvat uktam
tad viparīte ghaṭa tva kulāla kṛti tva rūpa anvaya vyatireka prakāra samāna prakāra kārya kāraṇa bhāva
eva sāmarthyam iti asya daṇḍa ghaṭa ādau nirṇīta tvāt iti arthaḥ

original: tatra yanna kṛtiviṣayo na tatra kāryamiti vyatirekagrahaḥ suśaka ityata āha-- pārimāṇḍalyasyāpīti //
analyzed: tatra yat na kṛti viṣayaḥ na tatra kāryam iti vyatireka grahaḥ su śakaḥ iti atas āha pārimāṇḍalyasya api iti
tti bhū cha ka kha

original: na ca tatra ghaṭābhāvo na pratyakṣaḥ /

abhāva pratyakṣa tva prayojaka tvena tvad uktasya yogya pratiyogika tva ādeḥ tatra api satvāt
evam ca tva tukta deśa kāla aparicchinna kṛti janya tva viparīta paricchinni kṛti janya tvena api anumitiḥ syāt
yat ca uktam upādāna jñānam sākṣātkāra tvena eva hetuḥ iti

original: na ca cakṣustaijasaṃ rūpādiṣu pacñasu 1 rūpasyaiva grāhakadravyatvāt ityādau viśiṣṭavṛttipakṣadharmatā viśeṣyavṛttivyāpteraṅgaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vācyam

original: tatrāpyavadhāraṇamahimnā rūpetaraviśeṣaguṇāvyajñakatve sati rūpagrāhakatvasya hetṛtvena viśeṣyamātrasya manasi vyabhicāritayā vyāpterapi viśiṣṭhatvāt

rupa ādiṣu pacñasu iti svarūpa kathanam matvā āha tatra api iti

ātma āśrayāt

vahni sāmānādhikaraṇyavat tva loka ādau avidyamāne dhūma tva ādau api tad abhāvāt
kintu anatirikta deśaka tvam

astu prakṛte kim iti atas āha vyarthā iti
ādi padena śarīrā janya tva ādi grahaḥ avacchedaka tva virahāt iti

original: tathā ca viśiṣṭo 3 heturvyāptiśūnya eveti bhāvaḥ //

vatvā ca iyam paṅktiḥ iti atas
nīla dhūma tvasya ca dhūma tva rūpa tādṛśa dharma antara ghaṭita tvāt na tad avacchedaka tā iti vācyam

original: idaṃ sukhi ātmatvādityādāvīśvarātmani sukhābhāvasamānādhikaraṇe vyabhicāriṇi gatatvāt /

ātma tvam tu īśvara ātma vṛtti tva avacchedena sukha sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāva adhikaraṇam eva iti vācyam

original: yadi caitadvṛkṣatva etatkapisaṃyogasāmānādhikaraṇyasya satvātkathaṃ tadabhāva iti /

atra ucyate

yathā āha liṅga parāmarśaḥ numānam iti

tasmāt iti pratyabhijñā yāgakāra ādi vyakti aikyāt anya viṣayaka tva bhrānti tvayoḥ ayogāt iti arthaḥ
varṇānām anitya tve pratyabhijñā virodhaḥ
sat pratipakṣāṇi ca
tathā hi
śabda tvam nitya vṛtti dravya tva vyāpya jātimat asamaveta ādi niṣṭha vṛtti tvāt ātma tvat

original: pratyabhijñādoṣayorbādhapratipakṣayoḥ prabalaṃ bādhakaṃ pūrvamuktvā pratipakṣadoṣaṃ cāha -- satpratipakṣāṇi ceti //
analyzed: pratyabhijñā doṣayoḥ bādha pratipakṣayoḥ prabalam bādhakam pūrvam uktvā pratipakṣa doṣam ca āha sat pratipakṣāṇi ca iti
śabda anitya tva anumānāni iti anuṣaṅgaḥ
śabdaḥ nityaḥ iti eva pratijñā uktau dvitīya ādi katipaya hetu asiddhiḥ
dhvani aṃśe bādhaḥ ca

original: ataḥ śabdatvaṃ nityavṛttīti pratijñā 2 ya dvitīyādihetvanugamāya tu varṇatvamityeva na kṛtam /
analyzed: atas śabda tvam nitya vṛtti iti pratijñā dvitīya ādi hetu anugamāya tu varṇa tvam iti eva na kṛtam
nitya vṛtti tvam ca jagat ādhāratā prayojaka saṃbandha bhinna sabandhena iti jñeyam
sa ca samandhaḥ nyāya mate samavāyaḥ
tena kāla vṛtti tvam ādāya na siddha nādhanatā avakāśaḥ
dhvani aṃśe bādhāt varṇa vṛtti tvena sādhya paryavasā
bhāvaḥ dravya tva iti
dravya tva vyāpya jātayaḥ pṛthivī tva jala tva ādayaḥ
nāma niga jñāa naṃ

original: dhvanyanityatāyā dhvanivarṇayorityādinā prāgupapādanāditi bhāvaḥ ityasti - a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: dhvanya nitya tāyāḥ dhvani varṇayoḥ ityādinā prāk upapādanāt iti bhāvaḥ iti asti a

original: tadvatsu pṛthivyādiṣvasamavetaṃ ya 1 dadviṣṭhaṃ avyāsajyavṛtti tadvavṛttitvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tadvatsu pṛthivī ādiṣu asamavetam avyāsajya vṛtti
śabdaḥ tu tādṛśa pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ātmanaḥ sva samavetaḥ dviṣṭhaḥ ca iti tad vṛtti śabda tve hetu satvam iti bhāvaḥ
ete ca hetavaḥ parītya eva
para siddhaiḥ dūṣaṇam iti ācārya ukteḥ
atas eva sat pratipakṣāṇi iti upakramaḥ
anyathā nitya tve mānam tu iti brūyāt
siddhānte

original: ata eva sudhāyāṃ prakṛtinaye“gaganādeśca satvatva“mityatra pṛthivyādiguṇatvenāpi śabdasyotpattaruktā /
analyzed: atas eva sudhāyām prakṛti naye gagana ādeḥ ca satva tvam iti atra pṛthivī ādi guṇa tvena api śabdasya utpattar uktā
pañcīkaraṇa prakriyām a vivakṣitvā jāti padasya sadṛśa dharma paratvam upetya svarītyā api vā
tena mad mataḥ iti agrima grantha avirodhaḥ iti āhuḥ
viśeṣaṇa kṛtyam agre sphuṭam ātma tva vat iti
tat ca kvāpi asamavetāt viṣṭhā ātma vṛtti tvāt hetu sādhyayoḥ sattvam spaṣṭham
nyāya mate vibhu tvena ātmanaḥ vṛtti tvāt

original: ghrāṇena // ghrāṇabhinnaṃ yadbahirindriyaṃ śrotrarūpaṃ tadastvitvāvadhāraka tāniyāmakatvādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ghrāṇena ghrāṇa bhinnam yat bahis indriyam śrotra rūpam tat astu itva avadhāraka tā niyāmaka tvāt iti arthaḥ
śabda jñānam hi kāryam sva kāraṇa bhūtam śrotra ākhyam indriya svarūpam anumāpayati
akāraṇakasya anitya jñānasya anudayāt
anyasya cakṣuḥ ādeḥ śabda jñāne karaṇa tva ayogāt
śabdasya tādṛśa indriya vyavasthāpaka tāyām śabda tvasya avacchaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
na tu śrotra iti viśiṣya rūpa tva vat iti
rūpa tva rasa tva sparśa tva vat iti arthaḥ
yad dviṣṭham avyāsajya vṛtti tad vṛtti tva abhāvāt iti arthaḥ a ka tā avacchedake
tasya ca
vanām ni tva inuni
varṇa vādaḥ pu
ātma tva mūrta tva samāna adhikaraṇa ādi niṣṭha vṛtti tvāt kāla tva vat
sva āśraya bhinna viśeṣa guṇa asamāna adhikaraṇa pratyakṣa vṛtti tvāt ātma tva vat

original: pṛthivīvṛtyavṛttitve ātmavṛtyavṛttitve ca sati sattāsākṣāvdyāpyasākṣāvdyāpyatvāt jalatvavat (5) / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: pṛthivī vṛtyavṛtti tve ātma vṛtyavṛtti tve ca sati sattā sākṣāt dyāpya sākṣāt dyāpya tvāt jala tva vat

original: bahirandriyavyavasthāpakātavacchedakānāṃ rūparasagandhasparśaśabdatvānāṃ ekasya pakṣatvepi gandhasya pṛthivīmātraguṇatvena
analyzed: rūpa rasa gandha sparśa śabda tvānām ekasya pakṣa tve pi gandhasya pṛthivī mātra guṇa tvena

jala paramāṇu ādi gata rūpa sa sparśāṇām apākaja tvena rūpa tva ādi trayasya nitya vṛtti tvāt ādhikya doṣa nirāsāya
rūpa tva vat iti e vā uktam ātma tva iti
ātma tva mūrta tvābhyām asamāna adhikaraṇam yat a dviṣṭham tad niṣṭhatvāt iti arthaḥ
mūrta tvam nāma iyat tā avacchinna parimāṇa yogi tvam
pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāya pu manasām dharmaḥ
pakṣa dṛṣṭānta bhūtayoḥ śabda tva kālayoḥ tādṛśa śabda kāla niṣṭhāt kālasya nitya tvāt ca hetu sādhya anugamaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
sva iti svasya śabda tvasya āśrayaḥ śabdaḥ
tad bhinna viśeṣa guṇaḥ rūpa ādiḥ
tad asamāna adhikaraṇam pratyakṣam ca tat
śabdaḥ eva
tad vṛtti tva ādi iti arthaḥ
dṛṣṭānte svasya ātma tvasya āśrayaḥ ātmā

original: tadatiriktaviśeṣaguṇenāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca avṛttibhūtamātmākhyaṃ vastu tadvṛttatvāditi hetvanugamo dhyeyaḥ /
analyzed: tad atirikta viśeṣa guṇena asamāna adhikaraṇam pratyakṣam ca avṛtti bhūtam ātma ākhyam vastu tad vṛtta tvāt iti hetvanugamaḥ dhyeyaḥ
sva śabdasya samabhivyāhṛta para tvāt
śabda tva mātra paratve ipi adoṣāt pṛthivī vṛttiḥ rūpa ādiḥ
ātma vṛttiḥ jñn ādiḥ
sati sattā sākṣāt vāpyam pakṣe guṇa tvam
dṛṣṭānte ca dravya tvam

original: tena sākṣāvdyāpyaṃ śabdatvaṃ jalatvaṃ ceti pakṣadṛṣṭāntayorhetvanugamaḥ / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: tena sākṣāt dyāpyam śabda tvam jala tvam ca iti pakṣa dṛṣṭāntayoḥ hetu anugamaḥ  /

original: 1.tayā-i. 2.vṛttipadaṃ na -mu. 3.ddviṣṭhaṃ - a. 4.'ti hetvanugamo dhyeyaḥ' ityasti. 'dṛṣṭānte' ityādipaṅktirnāsti -a. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: vṛtti padam na hetvanugamaḥ dhyeyaḥ iti asti dṛṣṭānte ityādi paṅktiḥ na asti a
vyoṃma itara avṛtti jātimat vṛtti tvāt ātma tvat
sa kala śabda vṛtti tvāt sattāvat
śrotram nitya vṛtti sattā vyāpya vyāpya jāti grahakam apārthiva indriya tvāt cakṣuḥ vat
varṇaḥ nityaḥ dhvani śabda tva vyāpya bhinna tve sati śrāvaṇa tvāt śabda tva vat
ityādi anumānaiḥ pratirodhāt
atra ādye hetau kāla ākāśa gata dvi tva niṣṭha dvi tva tve vyabhicārāya a dvi ṣṭhā iti uktam
dṛṣṭānte sādhya anumaḥ ca jala paramāṇu vṛtti tvena jñeyaḥ
sākṣāt dyāpya tvam nāma vyāpya avyāpya tve sati vyāpya tvam

original: guṇatvadravyatvayoḥ sattājāteśca madhye tathā guṇadravyatvayoḥ śabdatvajalatvayormadhye ca vyāpyadharmāntarasyābhāvāt //
analyzed: guṇa tva dravya tvayoḥ sattā jāteḥ ca madhye tathā guṇa dravya tvayoḥ śabda tva jala tvayoḥ madhye ca vyāpya dharma antarasya abhāvāt

original: vyometi // vyometarasminnavidyamāno yo jātimān śabdaḥ ātmā ca tadvṛttitvācchabdatvasyātmatvasya ceti pakṣadṛṣṭāntayorhetvanugatiḥ //
analyzed: vyoma iti vyoma itarasmin avidyamānaḥ yaḥ jātimān śabdaḥ ātmā ca tad vṛtti tvāt śabda tvasya ātma tvasya ca iti pakṣa dṛṣṭāntayoḥ hetu anugatiḥ
śrotram iti pakṣaḥ
nitya vṛtti vṛttiḥ sattā vyāpya guṇa tva pyāpya śabda rūpā jātiḥ tad gāhaka tvena pakṣe
dṛṣṭānte ca tādṛśa rūpatva grāhaka tvena sādhya anugamaḥ
rūpa tvasya api nityam yat jala paramāṇu ādi rūpam tad vṛtti tvāt apārthiva iti
para mate ghrāṇasya eva pārthiva tvena tad anyeṣām apārthiva tvāt na asiddhi ādiḥ

original: dhvanīti // dhvaniśca śabdatvavyāpyaṃ tāratvādikaṃ ca tābhyāṃ bhinnatve satītyarthaḥ -- pratirodhāditi //
analyzed: dhvani iti dhvaniḥ ca śabda tva vyāpyam tāra tva ādikam ca tābhyām bhinna tve sati iti arthaḥ pratirodhāt iti
sat pratipakṣāṇi iti anvayaḥ dvitva tve iti
anumāna upanīta kāla ākāśa ādi anocara mānasa apekṣā buddhi janyasya kāla ākāśa ubhaya gaka dvi tvasya
vanām ni tva inuni
varṇa vādaḥ pu
asamaveta vṛtti tvasya prativādinam prati asiddhi nirāsāya dravya tva vyāpya jātimat iti uktam
dvitīye gandha tve vyabhicārāya ghrāṇa bhinna iti

original: -- dravyatvavyāpyajātimatsu pṛthivyaptejovāyvātmamanaḥ svasamavetatvena dvitvatve tādṛśadvitvavṛttitvahetusatvepi nityavṛttitvābhāvādvyabhicāranirāsāyā  #
analyzed: dravya tva vyāpya jātimatsu pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ātma manaḥ sva samaveta tvena dvi tva tve tādṛśa dvi tva vṛtti tva hetu satve pi nitya vṛtti tva abhāvāt vyabhicāra nirāsāya
dviṣṭhā iti uktam iti arthaḥ
tarhi a dviṣṭhavṛtti tvāt iti eva astu iti atas āha gandha tva iti

rūpa tva ādikam tu nitya vṛtti iti gandha tva iti uktam

original: pārthivaguṇānāṃ pākajatvena gandho na nitya iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: pārthiva guṇānām pāka ja tvena gandhaḥ na nityaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tarhi asamavetā dviṣṭhā iti eva astu iti atas āha asamavetā iti
prativādinam prati iti
tārkikam prati iti arthaḥ

original: satpratipakṣānumānaprayoktṛdaśāyāṃ siddhāntinaḥ sthāpanāvāditvena parasyaiva prativāditvāt -- asiddhinisāyeti //
analyzed: sat pratipakṣa anumāna prayoktṛ daśāyām siddhāntinaḥ sthāpanā vādi tvena parasya eva prativādi tvāt
na ca asiddhi nirāsakam vyartham

original: “yanniṣṭhā yannirūpitā vyāptiryena viśeṣaṇena vinā na paricchadyate tadviśeṣaṇamarthavaditi“nyāyena
analyzed: yad niṣṭhā yad nirūpitā vyāptiḥ yena viśeṣaṇena vinā na paricchadyate tat viśeṣaṇam arthavat iti nyāyena
viśiṣṭa hetu niṣṭha vyāpteḥ ukta viśeṣaṇena vinā gṛhītum aśakya tvena vyāpti graha aupayika tvāt ca iti bhāvaḥ
gandha tve iti
pṛthivī guṇasya pāka ja tvena gandha tve nitya vṛtti tva rūpa sādhya abhāve pi ghrāṇa rūpa bahis indriya vyavasthāpaka tā avacchedaka tvāt ghrāṇa bhinnā iti uktānām
na doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ dukha tva iti
ayam granthaḥ na asti  tadvi a tat iti adhikam
duḥkha tva ādau avyabhicārāya bahis iti ca uktam
tṛtīye pi a dviṣṭha pada stha ādi ahetau iva prayojanam draṣṭavyam
duḥkha tva ādau vega tva ādau ca avyabhicārāya ātma tva mūrta tva asamāna adhikaraṇa iti uktam
caturthe gandha tve duḥkha tva ādau ca avyabhicārāya viśeṣa guṇa asamāna adhikaraṇa iti uktam
viśeṣaṇa guṇa asamāna adhikaraṇa manaḥ gata vega vartini vega tve vyabhicārāya pratyakṣa iti uktam
manaḥ gatave gaḥ tu a pratyakṣaḥ
tāvati ukte gakārasya api
kakāra rūpa viśeṣa guṇa samāna adhikaraṇa tvāt param prati asiddhiḥ
tad artham sva āśraya bhinnā iti uktam
tasya antari indriya vyavasthāpaka tā avacchedaka tvāt iti bhāvaḥ
ātmatva mūrtatva anyatara asamāna adhikaraṇāt viṣṭhavṛttitvāt iti uktau āha duḥkha tva ādau iti
mūrtatva asamāna adhikaraṇa duḥkha ādi niṣṭha duḥkha tva ādau nitya vṛtti tva abhāvena tatra a vyabhicāraḥ
ātma tva asamāna adhikaraṇam yat adviṣṭham tad vṛtti tvāt iti eva uktau pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu manaḥ dharma vega rūpa guṇasya ātma tva asamāna adhikaraṇa iti adviṣṭha viśeṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
pratyakṣa vṛtti tvāt iti eva uktau doṣam āha duḥkha tva ādau ca iti
tarhi pratyakṣa iti asya bāhya pratyakṣa iti artham matvā uktam gandha tva iti
param prati iti

original: 1.'vegatvādā' viti nāsti -cha. vegavatvādau -ga. 2.vegapadaṃ nāsti -cha. 3.tra vyabhicāravāraṇāya - i. 4.vṛttityādhikaṃ - i. @---------------------------------------------------------------------------
analyzed: vega tva ādau iti na asti cha vegavat tva ādau vega padam na asti cha vyabhicāra vāraṇāya i
vanām ni tva inuni
varṇa vādaḥ pu
evam ca kakārasya api śabda tva āśraya tvena tad bhinna tva abhāvāt na asiddhiḥ

duḥkha tva ādau avyabhicārāya ātma vṛtyavṛtti tve sati iti uktam
prabhā tva div avyabhicārāya sa mā ityādi uktam
evam ca sattā sākṣāt dyāpyam

original: 3 dravyatvaṃ prati tejastvameva sākṣāvdyāpyam na tu prabhātvādikamiti na vyabhicāraḥ /
analyzed: dravya tvam prati tejaḥ tvam eva sākṣāt dyāpyam na tu prabhā tva ādikam iti na vyabhicāraḥ
śabda tvam tu mad mate sattā sākṣāt dyāpyam

original: dravyatvaṃ prati paramate ca guṇatvaṃ pratisākṣāvdyāpyamiti nāsiddhiḥ //
analyzed: dravya tvam prati para mate ca guṇa tvam prati sākṣāt dyāpyam iti na asiddhiḥ
ṣaṣṭhe dhvani prāgabhāva tve vyabhicārāya jātimat iti uktam
gandha tva ādau avyabhicārāya vyoma itara avṛtti iti uktam
tārkikam prati iti arthaḥ na asiddhiḥ iti
asiddhi vārakasya api sārthakyam pūrvavat
ātma ityādi uktau doṣam āha gandha tva ādau iti
vyoma itarā vṛtti vastu vṛtti tvāt iti eva uktau doṣam āha dhvani prāgabhāva tve iti

original: nanu saptate sakalavṛttitvādityevoktau prameyatvādau kavalānvayini nityavṛtti 4 sādhyasyāpi satvena vyabhicārābhavācchabdeti vyartham /
analyzed: nanu saptate sakala vṛtti tvāt iti eva uktau prameya tva ādau kavala anvayini nitya vṛtti sādhyasya api satvena vyabhicāra abhavāt śabda iti vyartham

original: svarūpāsiddhivārakatvepi vyarthatvādityata īśvaravādauktadiśā vyāptyāśrayāṇāmanekatvasaṃpādakatvena sārthakyāditi bhāvenāha -- saptama iti
analyzed: svarūpa asiddhi vāraka tve api vyartha tvāt iti atas īśvara vāda ukta diśā vyāpti āśrayāṇām anekatva saṃpādaka tvena sārthakyāt iti bhāvena āha saptame iti
gakāra chaka ayam granthaḥ na asti

original: saptame śabdapadamakevalānvayino guṇatvāderapi saṃgrāhakatvena vikāsakatvānna vyartham //
analyzed: saptame śabda padam akevala anvayinaḥ guṇa tva ādeḥ api saṃgrāhaka tvena vikāsaka tvāt na vyartham

original: 1 aṣṭame sādhye nityavṛttisattādravyatvayoḥ sattāguṇatvayorvā grāhakatvenārthāntaramiti śaṅkānirāsāya 2 sattāvyāpyavyāpyetyuktam / /
analyzed: aṣṭame sādhye nitya vṛtti sattā dravya tvayoḥ sattā guṇa tvayoḥ vā grāhaka tvena artha antaram iti śaṅkā nirāsāya sattā vyāpya vyāpya iti uktam
hatoḥ vyabhicārāya a pārthiva iti uktam

original: 3 navame dhvanau śabdatvavyāpye tāratvādau cāvyabhicārāya dhvaniśabdatvavyāpyabhinnetyuktam / @---------------------------------------------------------------------------

analyzed: akevala anvayinaḥ iti
śabda niṣṭhasya iti api grāhyam
na kevalam kevala anvayinaḥ prameya tva ādeḥ api iti arthaḥ
ākāśa samaveta tva ādiḥ ādi padārthaḥ

original: aṣṭama iti // apārthivendriyatvāditi hetau yatsādhyaṃ nityavṛttītyādi tasminnityarthaḥ -- nityavṛttisattādravyatvayoriti //
analyzed: aṣṭame iti apārthiva indriya tvāt iti hetau yat sādhyam nitya vṛtti ityādi tasmin iti arthaḥ nitya vṛtti sattā dravya tvayoḥ iti
nitya vṛtti sattā jāti grāhakam iti ukte śabda gata sattā grāhaka tvena artha antaram
śabdasya anitya tve pi ākāśa ādi nitya vṛtti tvāt sattāyāḥ
atas nitya vṛtti sattā vyāpya jāti grāhakam iti
tāvati ukte śabdaḥ dravyam iti mate dravya tvasya
guṇaḥ iti mate guṇa tvasya grāhaka tvena artha antaram
atas sattā vyāpya vyāptā iti uktam iti arthaḥ

original: siddhasādhanatāvyadāsāya śabdasya nityatva siddhaye nityavṛttīti jātiviśeṣaṇamiti spaṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: siddhasādhanatā vyadāsāya śabdasya nitya tva siddhaye nitya vṛtti iti jāti viśeṣaṇam iti spaṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ

original: navama iti // dhvaniśabdatvavyāpyabhinnatve sati śrāvaṇatvādityatra dhvanipadasya kṛtyaṃ dhvanāviti //

original: api cāsya nirvikalpakajatīyasya jñānakāryaṃ vyāvahāraṃ saṃskāraṃ icchādikaṃ ca kadāpyajanayato na jñānatvaṃ yuktam /

original: na ca nirvikalpakena kasyacidapi vastutaḥ kadāpi siddhirdṛṣṭā /
